org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsDomainClass
class JpaGrailsDomainClass
extends org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.AbstractGrailsClass

Models a JPA domain class hooking the JPA annotations into the Grails meta model

author:
Graeme Rocher
since:
1.0

Created: May 15, 2009
